name: Last Christmas (doublezmagnum)
description:
A story about the Last Christmas from the perspective of overworked gas station attendant Gerry Vicis. Some poetry wrapped up in a terrifying romp.

Merry Christmas everyone, please enjoy this game I've made for you.

0 choices, about 15 to 30 minutes? 

CONTENT WARNING:

Blood, Violence, Scary Violent Stuff, Trauma and various Doomer Shit Being Described Through Text and Visuals.

Some upsetting stuff, if you aren't feeling the best, maybe stay away from this one.

Please enjoy.

Had to rush this one for CHRISTMAS!!!!

By Lucas Steele

art by Lucas, Quackatron, Blaze Scott

music by Lucas, Jingle, Loniand the Public Domain  (to be attributed)

If there is a problem with copyright attribution please alert me asap.

Thank you!!!
